In a dusty corner of an old library, there sat a peculiar book titled "The Book that Wrote Itself." Curious, a young girl named Mia opened it, only to find blank pages. As she read the title aloud, words began to flow onto the pages, forming a tale of adventure. Each chapter reflected her thoughts and dreams, whisking her away to enchanted forests and distant galaxies. Intrigued, Mia realized the book was a mirror of her imagination. As she penned her own story, the book transformed, creating an endless cycle of creativity. In that moment, Mia understood: every story begins within.
